languages.text: {n}Голос Соломона полон смирения:{/n} "Благодарю за внимание, Вольный Торговец. Палубы вашего корабля чисты, а значит, служба моя идет как надо".
{n}Solomorne's voice is full of humility:{/n} "Thank you for your attention, Rogue Trader. The decks of your ship are clean, which means my work is going as it should."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Соломона полон смирения:{/n} "Благодарю за внимание, Вольный Торговец. Палубы вашего корабля чисты, а значит, служба моя идет как надо".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is full of humility:{/n} "Thank you for your attention, Rogue Trader. The decks of your ship are clean, which means my work is going as it should."

{n}Solomorne's voice is full of humility:{/n} "Thank you for your attention, Rogue Trader. The decks of your ship are clean, which means my work is going as it should."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの声は謙虚さに満ちていた。{/n}「ご配慮に感謝します、ローグトレーダー。船のデッキは清掃が行き届いております。すなわち、私の職務は正しく遂行されているということです」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is full of humility:{/n} "Thank you for your attention, Rogue Trader. The decks of your ship are clean, which means my work is going as it should."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの声は謙虚さに満ちていた。{/n}「ご配慮に感謝します、ローグトレーダー。船のデッキは清掃が行き届いております。すなわち、私の職務は正しく遂行されているということです」

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Stimme ist voller Demut.{/n} "Danke für Eure Aufmerksamkeit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Die Decks Eures Schiffs sind sauber, also hat meine Arbeit den gewünschten Effekt."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is full of humility:{/n} "Thank you for your attention, Rogue Trader. The decks of your ship are clean, which means my work is going as it should."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Stimme ist voller Demut.{/n} "Danke für Eure Aufmerksamkeit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Die Decks Eures Schiffs sind sauber, also hat meine Arbeit den gewünschten Effekt."

languages.text: {n}La voix de Solomorne est empreinte d'humilité :{/n} « Je vous remercie de l'intérêt que vous me portez, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Les ponts de votre vaisseau sont propres, ce qui signifie que mon travail progresse comme il se doit. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is full of humility:{/n} "Thank you for your attention, Rogue Trader. The decks of your ship are clean, which means my work is going as it should."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Solomorne est empreinte d'humilité :{/n} « Je vous remercie de l'intérêt que vous me portez, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Les ponts de votre vaisseau sont propres, ce qui signifie que mon travail progresse comme il se doit. »

languages.text: {n}La voz de Solomorne está cargada de humildad:{/n} «Gracias por su interés, Comerciante Independiente. Las cubiertas de su nave están como una patena, lo que significa que mi trabajo progresa como debe».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is full of humility:{/n} "Thank you for your attention, Rogue Trader. The decks of your ship are clean, which means my work is going as it should."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Solomorne está cargada de humildad:{/n} «Gracias por su interés, Comerciante Independiente. Las cubiertas de su nave están como una patena, lo que significa que mi trabajo progresa como debe».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的声音充满了谦卑的意味。{/n}“感谢你的关注，行商浪人。你的飞船甲板很干净，这说明我的工作达到了要求。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is full of humility:{/n} "Thank you for your attention, Rogue Trader. The decks of your ship are clean, which means my work is going as it should."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的声音充满了谦卑的意味。{/n}“感谢你的关注，行商浪人。你的飞船甲板很干净，这说明我的工作达到了要求。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, cılız sesiyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Alakanız için müteşekkirim Hür Tacir. Geminin güverteleri temiz, yani her şey yolunda."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's voice is full of humility:{/n} "Thank you for your attention, Rogue Trader. The decks of your ship are clean, which means my work is going as it should."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne cılız sesiyle konuşur.{/n} "Alakanız için müteşekkirim Hür Tacir. Geminin güverteleri temiz, yani her şey yolunda."
